senses.synonym: 05022647-n (coldness due to a cold environment);07535351-n (an almost pleasurable sensation of fright; \""a frisson of surprise shot through him\"");07552647-n (a sudden numbing dread);14363692-n (a sensation of cold that often marks the start of an infection and the development of a fever);00370517-v (loose heat; \""The air cooled considerably after the thunderstorm\"");00371065-v (make cool or cooler; \""Chill the food\"");01822939-v (depress or discourage; \""The news of the city's surrender chilled the soldiers\""

relations.target: coldness=04636961-n (a lack of affection or enthusiasm; \""a distressing coldness of tone and manner\"");05022301-n (the absence of heat; \""the coldness made our breath visible\""; \""come in out of the cold\""; \""cold is a vasoconstrictor\"");05733621-n (the sensation produced by low temperatures; \""he shivered from the cold\""; \""the cold helped clear his head\""

penetrating=00806085-a (tending to penetrate; having the power of entering or piercing; \""a toxic penetrative spray applied to the surface\""; \""a cold penetrating wind\""; \""a penetrating odor\"");01748764-a (having or demonstrating ability to recognize or draw fine distinctions; \""an acute observer of politics and politicians\""; \""incisive comments\""; \""icy knifelike reasoning\""; \""as sharp and incisive as the stroke of a fang\""; \""penetrating insight\""; \""frequent penetrative observations\""

uncomfortable=00480005-a (providing or experiencing physical discomfort; \""an uncomfortable chair\""; \""an uncomfortable day in the hot sun\"");00481923-a (conducive to or feeling mental discomfort; \""this kind of life can prove disruptive and uncomfortable\""; \""the uncomfortable truth\""; \""grew uncomfortable beneath his appraising eye\""; \""an uncomfortable way of surprising me just when I felt surest\""; \""the teacher's presence at the conference made the child very uncomfortable\""

senses.definition: A moderate, but uncomfortable and penetrating coldness
